entry.title: Cineville film pass now offers access to seven Flemish cinemas
entry.content:
Cineville film pass now offers access to seven Flemish cinemas

The Cineville Pass offers unlimited access to all member cinemas for €21 a month (€18 a month for under 26s). From Sunday, it can be used in 21 Belgian cinemas.
